talk011: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Well, will you get me the<clr:0000> golden apples<clr:ffff>?
talk013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I got <clr:0000>five golden apples<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0> So you get one
pretty stone!
talk014:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, not yet... <sp:5:1:0>If you get your hands on
<clr:0000>five golden apples<clr:ffff>, bring them to me!
talk002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Isn't that green color of the stone so
pretty?<sp:5:1:0> I found it myself.
talk015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Thanks for the golden apples. The pretty
stone is all yours!
talk016:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>There's even a shimmery light coming off
of it...<sp:5:1:0> It's super special.
talk004:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>Huh? You can't have it!<sp:5:0:0> No, no! I found it!


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hm... <sp:5:1:0>But if you do something for me...<sp:5:0:0>
MAYBE I'll consider it.
talk017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Farther up this path is the bottomless
Mido Swamp. On its north side are trees
where golden apples grow.
If you want my pretty stone, I'll trade you
for <clr:0000>five golden apples<clr:ffff>!
talk005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>As long as they're golden apples, I don't
care where you get them.

So please bring me <clr:0000>five golden apples<clr:ffff>!
talk018:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Look at the beam of light coming from the
stone!<sp:5:1:0> Yes, yes, this is a very special
stone indeed!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You want this stone pretty bad, huh?<sp:5:0:0>
I can see it in your eyes.
talk006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>So?<sp:5:0:0> Help me out, and I'll probably give
you this pretty stone.
talk019:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Notice>Hm?<sp:5:1:0> Could it be that you have five
golden apples?
talk007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Keep following this path and go real super
far on it.
talk008:
You'll find a big bog called Mido Swamp,
and on the north side of the bog are trees
where <clr:0000>golden apples <clr:ffff>grow.
But there have been more monsters
recently,<sp:5:1:0> so going there to pick them
is hard now...
Oh! Oh yeah, also the bog is bottomless,
so don't fall in!
talk009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>OK!<sp:5:0:0> The thing is, I love <clr:0000>golden apples<clr:ffff>.
And a pretty stone is pretty, but I can't
really eat it...
So if you bring me <clr:0000>five golden apples<clr:ffff>,
I'll trade you one pretty stone!
talk010:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Hmph.<sp:5:1:0> Well then, please don't touch my
pretty stone.
